full_threads.body:
Site Scan for 19 September 2023

iThemes Security is becoming Solid Security

We have been working hard for almost a year to bring you incredible new features in the form of our new and improved brand: SolidWP. Discover what's coming very soon!

Learn More about Solid Security

Site Scan
The scheduled site scan found 1 issue when scanning https://superfrescoeasy.com.au.

Known Vulnerabilities
  • WordPress Essential Addons for Elementor plugin <= 5.8.8 - Contributor+ Privilege Escalation vulnerability
View Report

What Actions Should I Take?
Vulnerable WordPress plugins and themes are the #1 reason WordPress sites get hacked. Either quickly update the vulnerable theme, plugin or WordPress version immediately to the newest version or immediately deactivate and delete the plugin or theme from your WordPress installation until a fix is available.

How to View the Report & See Available Updates
1 View the Site Scan Report available now from your WordPress admin dashboard.
2 In the Known Vulnerabilities section of the report, click "Show Details." If a security fix is available, the report will indicate the latest version number.
3 If a security fix is available, update the vulnerable plugin or theme as soon as possible from Your WordPress admin dashboard > Updates page. Log in now to update.

Go Pro Now to Get Automatic Vulnerability Patching
iThemes Security Pro will automatically update vulnerable plugins and themes for you if a patch is available so you don't have to manually log in to update. Get your site patched by iThemes Security Pro before hackers discover vulnerabilities on your site, all without doing a thing.

Get all of this in the Site Scanner Pro:
Save time when time is of the utmost importance to patch vulnerabilities before hackers and bots can find and exploit them.
Free your team from mundane updates by removing the need to manually log in to update plugins and themes.
Automatically updates vulnerable plugins, themes, and WordPress core for you if it fixes a vulnerability that was found by the Site Scanner.
Hardens your website if you are running outdated software, including checks for old WordPress sites that could be used to compromise your server.
Go Pro Now

Want two-factor authentication, scheduled site scanning, ticketed support and more?

Get iThemes Security Pro

To unsubscribe from these updates, visit the Settings page in the iThemes Security plugin menu.
